ARABIC: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who fear the punishment of their Lord, --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and fear the chastisement of their Lord –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who are afraid of the torment of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who fear the punishment of their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who fear the torment of their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those who are fearful of the chastisement of their Lord--
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and go in fear of the chastisement of their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who are fearful of their Lord's doom -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and are fearful of the punishment of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who are fearful of their Lord's torment -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and those who are apprehensive of the punishment of their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And those who fear the displeasure of their Lord,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who fear the torment of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and go in fear of the punishment of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those who fear the punishment of their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:27] and who are apprehensive of the chastisement of their Lord —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who are fearful of their Lord's doom
